item.name: HTTP port avilable
item.description: Проверка на доступность и работоспособность порта.

trigger.name: HTTP port is NOT avilable
trigger.description: If two consecutive checks fail, a trigger is triggered.

item.name: HardKey state ServerB
item.description: The status of the physical key for the DB service

item.name: AES input state
item.description: The presence of a signal at the AES input

trigger.name: AES input state IS WRONG
trigger.description: Checking the state of the AES input for equality to the {$AESIN_STATE} macro. By default, we expect TRUE

item.name: Analog input state
item.description: The presence of a signal at the analog input

trigger.name: Analog input state IS WRONG
trigger.description: Checking the state of the AES input for equality to the {$ANALOGIN_STATE} macro. By default, we expect TRUE

item.name: Connection state ServerA
item.description: Connection status to the DB service

trigger.name: Connection state ServerA IS FAILED
trigger.description: Checking the connection status of Server A

item.name: DB Connection state ServerA
item.description: DB service connection status to MBD

trigger.name: DB Connection state ServerA IS FAILED
trigger.description: Checking the DB connection status for Server A

item.name: HardKey state ServerA
item.description: The status of the physical key for the DB service

trigger.name: Redundancy state ServerA IS WRONG
trigger.description: Redundancy status for ServerA

item.name: Connection state ServerB
item.description: Connection status to the DB service

trigger.name: Connection state ServerB IS FAILED
trigger.description: Checking the connection status of Server B

item.name: DB Connection state ServerB
item.description: DB service connection status to MBD

trigger.name: DB Connection state ServerB IS FAILED
trigger.description: Checking the DB connection status for Server B

trigger.name: Redundancy state ServerB IS WRONG
trigger.description: Redundancy status for ServerB

item.name: FM1 Pilot-tone status
item.description: The presence of a pilot tone in channel 1 of the FM tuner

trigger.name: FM1 Pilot-tone status IS FALSE
trigger.description: Checking the status of the Pilot-tone 1 channel FM receiver

item.name: FM2 Pilot-tone status
item.description: The presence of a pilot tone in channel 1 of the FM tuner

trigger.name: FM2 Pilot-tone status IS FALSE
trigger.description: Checking the status of the Pilot-tone 2 channel FM receiver

item.name: License for Int.Stream Receive
item.description: Availability of an Internet Stream Receive license

item.name: License for Int.Stream Transmit
item.description: Availability of an Internet Stream Transmit license

item.name: License for Retransmission
item.description: Availability of an Retransmission the license

trigger.name: Player status mode IS WRONG
trigger.description: Checking the player's status for a match with the {$PLAYERMODE_STATE} macro

trigger.name: Player status isPlaing IS FALSE
trigger.description: Checking the isPlaying status for the player

item.name: Last disk cleanup
item.description: Date and time of the last disk cleanup

item.name: Scheduler state today autobloks
item.description: Availability of autoblocks in the current day

trigger.name: Scheduler state today autobloks IS TRUE
trigger.description: The trigger for triggering the autoblock function. Filling in unavailable files using automatic selection of materials.

item.name: Scheduler state today files problem
item.description: The number of problematic files in the current day

trigger.name: CPU Load state IS OVERLOAD last 5 times
trigger.description: Checking the CPU load status over the last 5 measurements in order to reduce false positives

trigger.name: CPU Temp state IS OVERHEATING
trigger.description: Checking the processor temperature status. Triggered when 110 degrees Celsius is exceeded

trigger.name: FM processing preset name IS WRONG
trigger.description: Checking the correctness of the preset used for FM processing

trigger.name: FM processing operation state IS FALSE
trigger.description: Checking the operation status of FM Processing

trigger.name: General condition IS FAIL
trigger.description: Checking the overall health of the system

trigger.name: GPU Temp state IS OVERHEATING
trigger.description: Checking the GPU temperature status. Triggered when 110 degrees Celsius is exceeded

trigger.name: RAM Load state IS HIGHLOADING last 5 times
trigger.description: Checking the state of RAM congestion over the last 5 measurements in order to reduce false positives

trigger.name: Root volume capacity is higher then {$TR_ROOT_CAP_CRIT}
Root volume capacity is higher then {$TR_ROOT_CAP_WARN}
Root volume capacity state IS HighLoading
trigger.description: Checking the fullness status of the root volume (/)

trigger.name: SSD capacity state IS HighLoading
trigger.description: Checking the SSD occupancy status

item.name: Get system status
item.description: Getting RAW json system status data

trigger.name: Get system status NO DATA 5m
trigger.description: Verifying data receipt

trigger.name: High swap space usage
trigger.event_name: High swap space usage (less than {$TR_SWAP_PFREE_MIN_WARN}% free)

trigger.name: SWAP capacity state IS HighLoading
trigger.description: Checking the status of SWAP occupancy

macro.description: The TCP port that the REST API runs on
Sets the name of the desired preset FM processing
